name: Riving Strike
text: When you infuse your weapon with arcane might, your attacks make foes more susceptible to magic.
prerequisites: Arcane Strike, ability to cast arcane spells.
benefit: If you have a weapon that is augmented by your Arcane Strike feat, when you damage a creature with an attack made with that weapon, that creature takes a –2 penalty on saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities. This effect lasts for 1 round.
staminaText: When you use this feat, you can spend up to 3 stamina points to increase the duration of the effect by 1 round for each stamina point spent.
text_zh: 奥术力量顺着你的武器撕开对手的魔法防护，使他更易受到你的法术影响。
prerequisites_zh: 奥术打击，可以施放奥术魔法。
benefit_zh: 如果你以奥术打击这次增强的武器对一个敌人造成了伤害，那么这个敌人在一轮内对抗你的法术和类法术能力时，在所有的豁免检定上承受-2减值。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗至多3点耐力来延长这个效果的持续时间，每消耗1点就能多持续1轮。
